trans-unit.id: **Add new contact**: to create your one-time QR Code for your contact.
trans-unit.source: **Add new contact**: to create your one-time QR Code or link for your contact.
trans-unit.target: **Adicionar novo contato**: para criar seu QR Code ou link único para seu contato.

trans-unit.id: **Create link / QR code** for your contact to use.
trans-unit.source: **Create link / QR code** for your contact to use.
trans-unit.target: **Crie um link / QR code** para seu contato usar.

trans-unit.id: **More private**: check new messages every 20 minutes. Device token is shared with SimpleX Chat server, but not how many contacts or messages you have.
trans-unit.source: **More private**: check new messages every 20 minutes. Device token is shared with SimpleX Chat server, but not how many contacts or messages you have.
trans-unit.target: **Mais privado**: verifique as novas mensagens a cada 20 minutos. O token do dispositivo é compartilhado com o servidor do SimpleX Chat, mas não quantos contatos ou mensagens você tem.

trans-unit.id: **Most private**: do not use SimpleX Chat notifications server, check messages periodically in the background (depends on how often you use the app).
trans-unit.source: **Most private**: do not use SimpleX Chat notifications server, check messages periodically in the background (depends on how often you use the app).
trans-unit.target: **Mais privado**: não use o servidor de notificações do SimpleX Chat, verifique as mensagens periodicamente em segundo plano (depende da frequência com que você usa o aplicativo).

trans-unit.id: **Paste received link** or open it in the browser and tap **Open in mobile app**.
trans-unit.source: **Paste received link** or open it in the browser and tap **Open in mobile app**.
trans-unit.target: **Cole o link recebido** ou abra-o no navegador e toque em **Abrir no aplicativo**.

trans-unit.id: **Please note**: you will NOT be able to recover or change passphrase if you lose it.
trans-unit.source: **Please note**: you will NOT be able to recover or change passphrase if you lose it.
trans-unit.target: **Observação**: NÃO será possível recuperar ou alterar a frase secreta se você a perder.

trans-unit.id: **Recommended**: device token and notifications are sent to SimpleX Chat notification server, but not the message content, size or who it is from.
trans-unit.source: **Recommended**: device token and notifications are sent to SimpleX Chat notification server, but not the message content, size or who it is from.
trans-unit.target: **Recomendado**: o token do dispositivo e as notificações são enviados para o servidor de notificações do SimpleX Chat, mas não o conteúdo, o tamanho ou o remetente da mensagem.

trans-unit.id: **Scan QR code**: to connect to your contact in person or via video call.
trans-unit.source: **Scan QR code**: to connect to your contact in person or via video call.
trans-unit.target: **Escaneie QR Code**: para se conectar ao seu contato pessoalmente ou por meio de chamada de vídeo.

trans-unit.id: **Warning**: Instant push notifications require passphrase saved in Keychain.
trans-unit.source: **Warning**: Instant push notifications require passphrase saved in Keychain.
trans-unit.target: **Aviso**: As notificações push instantâneas exigem uma senha salva no Keychain.

trans-unit.id: A random profile will be sent to the contact that you received this link from
trans-unit.source: A random profile will be sent to the contact that you received this link from
trans-unit.target: Um perfil aleatório será enviado para o contato do qual você recebeu este link

trans-unit.id: A random profile will be sent to your contact
trans-unit.source: A random profile will be sent to your contact
trans-unit.target: Um perfil aleatório será enviado para o seu contato

trans-unit.id: A separate TCP connection will be used **for each chat profile you have in the app**.
trans-unit.source: A separate TCP connection will be used **for each chat profile you have in the app**.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão TCP separada será usada **para cada perfil de bate-papo que você tiver no aplicativo**.

trans-unit.id: A separate TCP connection will be used **for each contact and group member**. **Please note**: if you have many connections, your battery and traffic consumption can be substantially higher and some connections may fail.
trans-unit.source: A separate TCP connection will be used **for each contact and group member**. **Please note**: if you have many connections, your battery and traffic consumption can be substantially higher and some connections may fail.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão TCP separada será usada **para cada contato e membro do grupo**. **Observação**: se você tiver muitas conexões, o consumo de bateria e de tráfego poderá ser substancialmente maior e algumas conexões poderão falhar.

trans-unit.note: accept contact request via notification accept incoming call via notification

trans-unit.id: Add servers by scanning QR codes.
trans-unit.source: Add servers by scanning QR codes.
trans-unit.target: Adicione servidores escaneando o QR code.

trans-unit.id: Admins can create the links to join groups.
trans-unit.source: Admins can create the links to join groups.
trans-unit.target: Os administradores podem criar os links para ingressar em grupos.

trans-unit.id: All chats and messages will be deleted - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.source: All chats and messages will be deleted - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.target: Todos os chats e mensagens serão excluídos - isso não pode ser desfeito!

trans-unit.id: All group members will remain connected.
trans-unit.source: All group members will remain connected.
trans-unit.target: Todos os membros do grupo permanecerão conectados.

trans-unit.id: All messages will be deleted - this cannot be undone! The messages will be deleted ONLY for you.
trans-unit.source: All messages will be deleted - this cannot be undone! The messages will be deleted ONLY for you.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens serão excluídas - isso não pode ser desfeito! As mensagens serão excluídas APENAS para você.

trans-unit.id: All your contacts will remain connected
trans-unit.source: All your contacts will remain connected

trans-unit.id: Allow disappearing messages only if your contact allows it to you.
trans-unit.source: Allow disappearing messages only if your contact allows it to you.
trans-unit.target: Permita o desaparecimento de mensagens somente se o seu contato permitir.

trans-unit.id: Allow irreversible message deletion only if your contact allows it to you.
trans-unit.source: Allow irreversible message deletion only if your contact allows it to you.
trans-unit.target: Permita a exclusão irreversível da mensagem somente se o seu contato permitir.

trans-unit.id: Allow sending direct messages to members.
trans-unit.source: Allow sending direct messages to members.
trans-unit.target: Permitir o envio de mensagens diretas aos membros.
Permitir o envio de mensagens que desaparecem.

trans-unit.id: Allow to irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.source: Allow to irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.target: Permite excluir irreversivelmente as mensagens enviadas.

trans-unit.id: Allow voice messages only if your contact allows them.
trans-unit.source: Allow voice messages only if your contact allows them.
trans-unit.target: Permitir mensagens de voz somente se o seu contato permitir.

trans-unit.id: Allow your contacts to irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.source: Allow your contacts to irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.target: Permitir que seus contatos excluam de forma irreversível as mensagens enviadas.

trans-unit.id: Allow your contacts to send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.source: Allow your contacts to send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.target: Permitir que seus contatos enviem mensagens que desaparecem.

trans-unit.id: Allow your contacts to send voice messages.
trans-unit.source: Allow your contacts to send voice messages.
trans-unit.target: Permitir que seus contatos enviem mensagens de voz.

trans-unit.id: Both you and your contact can irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.source: Both you and your contact can irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.target: Você e seu contato podem excluir mensagens enviadas de forma irreversível.

trans-unit.id: Both you and your contact can send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.source: Both you and your contact can send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.target: Você e seu contato podem enviar mensagens que desaparecem.

trans-unit.id: Both you and your contact can send voice messages.
trans-unit.source: Both you and your contact can send voice messages.
trans-unit.target: Você e seu contato podem enviar mensagens de voz.
Não é possível convidar o contato!

trans-unit.id: Cannot access keychain to save database password
trans-unit.source: Cannot access keychain to save database password
trans-unit.target: Não conseguimos acessar a keychain para guardar a palavra-passe da base de dados
Não é possível receber o arquivo
Alterar senha do banco de dados?
Banco de dados de chat excluído
Banco de dados de chat importado

trans-unit.id: Check server address and try again.
trans-unit.source: Check server address and try again.
trans-unit.target: Verifique o endereço do servidor e tente novamente.

trans-unit.id: Compare security codes with your contacts.
trans-unit.source: Compare security codes with your contacts.
trans-unit.target: Compare os códigos de segurança com seus contatos.
Conectar via link de uso único?

trans-unit.id: Contact and all messages will be deleted - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.source: Contact and all messages will be deleted - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.target: Contato e todas as mensagens serão excluídas - isso não pode ser desfeito!

trans-unit.id: Contacts can mark messages for deletion; you will be able to view them.
trans-unit.source: Contacts can mark messages for deletion; you will be able to view them.
trans-unit.target: Contatos podem marcar mensagens para exclusão; você será capaz de visualizá-los.
Gerar um link de convite de uso único

trans-unit.id: Currently maximum supported file size is %@.
trans-unit.source: Currently maximum supported file size is %@.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de ficheiro máximo suportado atualmente é %@.

trans-unit.id: Database encryption passphrase will be updated and stored in the keychain.
trans-unit.source: Database encryption passphrase will be updated and stored in the keychain.
trans-unit.target: A frase-passe criptográfica da base de dados vai ser atualizada e armazenada na keychain.

trans-unit.id: Database encryption passphrase will be updated.
trans-unit.source: Database encryption passphrase will be updated.
trans-unit.target: Senha de criptografia do banco de dados será atualizada.

trans-unit.id: Database is encrypted using a random passphrase, you can change it.
trans-unit.source: Database is encrypted using a random passphrase, you can change it.
trans-unit.target: O banco de dados é criptografado usando uma senha aleatórioa, você pode alterá-la.

trans-unit.id: Database is encrypted using a random passphrase. Please change it before exporting.
trans-unit.source: Database is encrypted using a random passphrase. Please change it before exporting.
trans-unit.target: O banco de dados é criptografado usando uma senha aleatória. Por favor, altere-o antes de exportar.
Senha e exportação do banco de dados

trans-unit.id: Database passphrase is different from saved in the keychain.
trans-unit.source: Database passphrase is different from saved in the keychain.
trans-unit.target: A frase-passe da base de dados é diferente daquela guardada na keychain.

trans-unit.id: Database passphrase is required to open chat.
trans-unit.source: Database passphrase is required to open chat.
trans-unit.target: Senha do banco de dados é necessária para abrir o chat.

trans-unit.id: Database will be encrypted and the passphrase stored in the keychain.
trans-unit.source: Database will be encrypted and the passphrase stored in the keychain.
trans-unit.target: A base de dados vai ser encriptada e a frase-passe armazenada na keychain.
O banco de dados será criptografado.

trans-unit.id: Database will be migrated when the app restarts
trans-unit.source: Database will be migrated when the app restarts
trans-unit.target: A base de dados vai ser migrada quando o aplicativo reiniciar

trans-unit.id: Delete files for all chat profiles
trans-unit.source: Delete files for all chat profiles
trans-unit.target: Excluir arquivos de todos os perfis de chat

trans-unit.id: Device authentication is disabled. Turning off SimpleX Lock.
trans-unit.source: Device authentication is disabled. Turning off SimpleX Lock.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação do dispositivo está desativada. Desativando o bloqueio SimpleX.

trans-unit.id: Device authentication is not enabled. You can turn on SimpleX Lock via Settings, once you enable device authentication.
trans-unit.source: Device authentication is not enabled. You can turn on SimpleX Lock via Settings, once you enable device authentication.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação do dispositivo não está habilitada. Você pode ativar o Bloqueio SimpleX em Configurações, depois de ativar a autenticação do dispositivo.

trans-unit.id: Direct messages between members are prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.source: Direct messages between members are prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens diretas entre membros são proibidas neste grupo.

trans-unit.id: Disappearing messages are prohibited in this chat.
trans-unit.source: Disappearing messages are prohibited in this chat.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens temporárias são proibidas nesse chat.

trans-unit.id: Disappearing messages are prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.source: Disappearing messages are prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens que temporárias são proibidas neste grupo.

trans-unit.id: Do NOT use SimpleX for emergency calls.
trans-unit.source: Do NOT use SimpleX for emergency calls.
trans-unit.target: NÃO use SimpleX para chamadas de emergência.
Mensagem encriptada: erro da base de dados
Erro ao aceitar solicitação de contato
Erro acessando ficheiro da base de dados
Erro ao criar o link de grupo
Erro ao excluir banco de dados de chat
Erro ao excluir perfil do usuário
Erro ao criptografar o banco de dados
Erro ao exportar banco de chat
Erro ao importar banco de dados de chat
Erro ao salvar o perfil do grupo

trans-unit.id: File will be received when your contact is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.source: File will be received when your contact is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.target: O arquivo será recebido quando seu contato estiver online, aguarde ou verifique mais tarde!

trans-unit.id: Group invitation is no longer valid, it was removed by sender.
trans-unit.source: Group invitation is no longer valid, it was removed by sender.
trans-unit.target: O convite de grupo não é mais válido, foi removido pelo remetente.

trans-unit.id: Group members can irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.source: Group members can irreversibly delete sent messages.
trans-unit.target: Os membros do grupo podem excluir mensagens enviadas de forma irreversível.

trans-unit.id: Group members can send direct messages.
trans-unit.source: Group members can send direct messages.
trans-unit.target: Os membros do grupo podem enviar DMs.

trans-unit.id: Group members can send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.source: Group members can send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.target: Os membros do grupo podem enviar mensagens que desaparecem.

trans-unit.id: Group members can send voice messages.
trans-unit.source: Group members can send voice messages.
trans-unit.target: Os membros do grupo podem enviar mensagens de voz.

trans-unit.id: Group profile is stored on members' devices, not on the servers.
trans-unit.source: Group profile is stored on members' devices, not on the servers.
trans-unit.target: O perfil do grupo é armazenado nos dispositivos dos membros, não nos servidores.

trans-unit.id: Group will be deleted for all members - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.source: Group will be deleted for all members - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.target: O grupo será excluído para todos os membros - isso não pode ser desfeito!

trans-unit.id: Group will be deleted for you - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.source: Group will be deleted for you - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.target: O grupo será excluído para você - isso não pode ser desfeito!

trans-unit.id: Hide app screen in the recent apps.
trans-unit.source: Hide app screen in the recent apps.

trans-unit.id: If the video fails to connect, flip the camera to resolve it.
trans-unit.source: If the video fails to connect, flip the camera to resolve it.

trans-unit.id: If you can't meet in person, **show QR code in the video call**, or share the link.
trans-unit.source: If you can't meet in person, **show QR code in the video call**, or share the link.

trans-unit.id: If you cannot meet in person, you can **scan QR code in the video call**, or your contact can share an invitation link.
trans-unit.source: If you cannot meet in person, you can **scan QR code in the video call**, or your contact can share an invitation link.

trans-unit.id: If you need to use the chat now tap **Do it later** below (you will be offered to migrate the database when you restart the app).
trans-unit.source: If you need to use the chat now tap **Do it later** below (you will be offered to migrate the database when you restart the app).

trans-unit.id: Image will be received when your contact is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.source: Image will be received when your contact is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.target: A imagem será recebida quando seu contato estiver online, aguarde ou verifique mais tarde!
Importar banco de dados de chat?

trans-unit.id: Incognito mode is not supported here - your main profile will be sent to group members
trans-unit.source: Incognito mode is not supported here - your main profile will be sent to group members
trans-unit.target: O modo de navegação anônima não é suportado aqui - seu perfil principal será enviado aos membros do grupo

trans-unit.id: Incognito mode protects the privacy of your main profile name and image — for each new contact a new random profile is created.
trans-unit.source: Incognito mode protects the privacy of your main profile name and image — for each new contact a new random profile is created.
trans-unit.target: O modo de navegação anônima protege a privacidade do nome e da imagem do seu perfil principal — para cada novo contato, um novo perfil aleatório é criado.

trans-unit.id: Instant push notifications will be hidden!
trans-unit.source: Instant push notifications will be hidden!

trans-unit.id: Irreversible message deletion is prohibited in this chat.
trans-unit.source: Irreversible message deletion is prohibited in this chat.
trans-unit.target: A exclusão irreversível de mensagens é proibida neste chat.

trans-unit.id: Irreversible message deletion is prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.source: Irreversible message deletion is prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.target: A exclusão irreversível de mensagens é proibida neste grupo.

trans-unit.id: It allows having many anonymous connections without any shared data between them in a single chat profile.
trans-unit.source: It allows having many anonymous connections without any shared data between them in a single chat profile.
trans-unit.target: Permite ter várias conexões anônimas sem nenhum dado compartilhado entre elas em um único perfil de chat.

trans-unit.id: It can happen when: 1. The messages expire on the server if they were not received for 30 days, 2. The server you use to receive the messages from this contact was updated and restarted. 3. The connection is compromised. Please connect to the developers via Settings to receive the updates about the servers. We will be adding server redundancy to prevent lost messages.
trans-unit.source: It can happen when: 1. The messages expire on the server if they were not received for 30 days, 2. The server you use to receive the messages from this contact was updated and restarted. 3. The connection is compromised. Please connect to the developers via Settings to receive the updates about the servers. We will be adding server redundancy to prevent lost messages.

trans-unit.id: It seems like you are already connected via this link. If it is not the case, there was an error (%@).
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are already connected via this link. If it is not the case, there was an error (%@).

trans-unit.id: Make sure SMP server addresses are in correct format, line separated and are not duplicated (%@).
trans-unit.source: Make sure SMP server addresses are in correct format, line separated and are not duplicated (%@).

trans-unit.id: Make sure WebRTC ICE server addresses are in correct format, line separated and are not duplicated.
trans-unit.source: Make sure WebRTC ICE server addresses are in correct format, line separated and are not duplicated.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que os endereços do servidor WebRTC ICE estão em formato correto, separados por linha e não estejam duplicados.

trans-unit.id: Many people asked: *if SimpleX has no user identifiers, how can it deliver messages?*
trans-unit.source: Many people asked: *if SimpleX has no user identifiers, how can it deliver messages?*

trans-unit.id: Member role will be changed to "%@". All group members will be notified.
trans-unit.source: Member role will be changed to "%@". All group members will be notified.

trans-unit.id: Member role will be changed to "%@". The member will receive a new invitation.
trans-unit.source: Member role will be changed to "%@". The member will receive a new invitation.

trans-unit.id: Member will be removed from group - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.source: Member will be removed from group - this cannot be undone!
trans-unit.target: O membro será removido do grupo - isso não pode ser desfeito!

trans-unit.id: Migration failed. Tap **Skip** below to continue using the current database. Please report the issue to the app developers via chat or email [chat@simplex.chat](mailto:chat@simplex.chat).
trans-unit.source: Migration failed. Tap **Skip** below to continue using the current database. Please report the issue to the app developers via chat or email [chat@simplex.chat](mailto:chat@simplex.chat).

trans-unit.id: Most likely this contact has deleted the connection with you.
trans-unit.source: Most likely this contact has deleted the connection with you.
trans-unit.target: Porvavelmente esse contato excluiu a conexão com você.
Novo arquivo de banco de dados

trans-unit.id: No permission to record voice message
trans-unit.source: No permission to record voice message

trans-unit.target: Arquivo de banco de dados antigo
Link de convite de uso único

trans-unit.id: Onion hosts will be required for connection. Requires enabling VPN.
trans-unit.source: Onion hosts will be required for connection. Requires enabling VPN.

trans-unit.id: Onion hosts will be used when available. Requires enabling VPN.
trans-unit.source: Onion hosts will be used when available. Requires enabling VPN.

trans-unit.id: Onion hosts will not be used.
trans-unit.source: Onion hosts will not be used.

trans-unit.id: Only client devices store user profiles, contacts, groups, and messages sent with **2-layer end-to-end encryption**.
trans-unit.source: Only client devices store user profiles, contacts, groups, and messages sent with **2-layer end-to-end encryption**.

trans-unit.id: Only group owners can change group preferences.
trans-unit.source: Only group owners can change group preferences.
trans-unit.target: Somente os proprietários do grupo podem alterar as preferências do grupo.

trans-unit.id: Only group owners can enable voice messages.
trans-unit.source: Only group owners can enable voice messages.
trans-unit.target: Somente o proprietários de grupo podem ativar mensagens de voz.

trans-unit.id: Only you can irreversibly delete messages (your contact can mark them for deletion).
trans-unit.source: Only you can irreversibly delete messages (your contact can mark them for deletion).
trans-unit.target: Somente você pode excluir irreversivelmente as mensagens (seu contato pode marcá-las para exclusão).

trans-unit.id: Only you can send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.source: Only you can send disappearing messages.

trans-unit.id: Only you can send voice messages.
trans-unit.source: Only you can send voice messages.
trans-unit.target: Somente você pode enviar mensagens de voz.

trans-unit.id: Only your contact can irreversibly delete messages (you can mark them for deletion).
trans-unit.source: Only your contact can irreversibly delete messages (you can mark them for deletion).
trans-unit.target: Somente seu contato pode excluir irreversivelmente mensagens (você pode marcá-las para exclusão).

trans-unit.id: Only your contact can send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.source: Only your contact can send disappearing messages.
trans-unit.target: Somente seu contato pode enviar mensagens temporárias.

trans-unit.id: Only your contact can send voice messages.
trans-unit.source: Only your contact can send voice messages.
trans-unit.target: Somente seu contato pode enviar mensagens de voz.

trans-unit.id: Open-source protocol and code – anybody can run the servers.
trans-unit.source: Open-source protocol and code – anybody can run the servers.
trans-unit.target: Protocolo de código aberto – qualquer um pode executar os servidores.

trans-unit.id: Opening the link in the browser may reduce connection privacy and security. Untrusted SimpleX links will be red.
trans-unit.source: Opening the link in the browser may reduce connection privacy and security. Untrusted SimpleX links will be red.
trans-unit.target: Abrir o link no navegador pode reduzir a privacidade e a segurança da conexão. Links SimpleX não confiáveis ficarão vermelhos.

trans-unit.id: Paste the link you received into the box below to connect with your contact.
trans-unit.source: Paste the link you received into the box below to connect with your contact.
trans-unit.target: Cole o link que você recebeu na caixa abaixo para conectar com o seu contato.

trans-unit.id: People can connect to you only via the links you share.
trans-unit.source: People can connect to you only via the links you share.
trans-unit.target: Pessoas podem se conectar com você somente via links compartilhados.

trans-unit.id: Please ask your contact to enable sending voice messages.
trans-unit.source: Please ask your contact to enable sending voice messages.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, peça ao seu contato para ativar o envio de mensagens de voz.

trans-unit.id: Please check that you used the correct link or ask your contact to send you another one.
trans-unit.source: Please check that you used the correct link or ask your contact to send you another one.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, cheque se você usou o link correto ou peça ao seu contato para enviar outro.

trans-unit.id: Please check your network connection with %@ and try again.
trans-unit.source: Please check your network connection with %@ and try again.

trans-unit.id: Please check yours and your contact preferences.
trans-unit.source: Please check yours and your contact preferences.

trans-unit.target: Por favor, digite a senha correta.

trans-unit.id: Please enter the previous password after restoring database backup. This action can not be undone.
trans-unit.source: Please enter the previous password after restoring database backup. This action can not be undone.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, digite a senha antiga depois de recuperar o backup do banco de dados. Essa ação não pode ser desfeita.

trans-unit.id: Please restart the app and migrate the database to enable push notifications.
trans-unit.source: Please restart the app and migrate the database to enable push notifications.

trans-unit.id: Please store passphrase securely, you will NOT be able to access chat if you lose it.
trans-unit.source: Please store passphrase securely, you will NOT be able to access chat if you lose it.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, guarde a senha em um local seguro, você não poderá acessar o chat se perdê-lo.

trans-unit.id: Please store passphrase securely, you will NOT be able to change it if you lose it.
trans-unit.source: Please store passphrase securely, you will NOT be able to change it if you lose it.
trans-unit.target: Guarde a senha em um local seguro, você NÃO poderá alterá-la se a perder.

trans-unit.id: Possibly, certificate fingerprint in server address is incorrect
trans-unit.source: Possibly, certificate fingerprint in server address is incorrect
trans-unit.target: Possivelmente, a impressão digital do certificado no endereço do servidor está incorreta
Proibir a exclusão irreversível de mensagens.

trans-unit.id: Prohibit sending direct messages to members.
trans-unit.source: Prohibit sending direct messages to members.
trans-unit.target: Proibir o envio de DMs para membros.
Proibir o envio de mensagens temporárias.
Proibir o envio de mensagens de voz.

trans-unit.id: Read more in our GitHub repository.
trans-unit.source: Read more in our GitHub repository.
trans-unit.target: Leia mais no nosso repositório do GitHub.

trans-unit.id: Recipients see updates as you type them.
trans-unit.source: Recipients see updates as you type them.
trans-unit.target: Os destinatários vêem as atualizações conforme você as digita.

trans-unit.id: Relay server is only used if necessary. Another party can observe your IP address.
trans-unit.source: Relay server is only used if necessary. Another party can observe your IP address.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de relay é usado apenas se necessário. Terceiros podem observar seu endereço IP.

trans-unit.id: Relay server protects your IP address, but it can observe the duration of the call.
trans-unit.source: Relay server protects your IP address, but it can observe the duration of the call.
trans-unit.target: O servidor relay protege seu endereço IP, mas pode observar a duração da chamada.

trans-unit.source: Restart the app to create a new chat profile

trans-unit.source: Restart the app to use imported chat database

trans-unit.id: Saved WebRTC ICE servers will be removed
trans-unit.source: Saved WebRTC ICE servers will be removed

trans-unit.id: Scan security code from your contact's app.

trans-unit.target: Escaneie o código de segurança do aplicativo do seu contato.

trans-unit.id: Send a live message - it will update for the recipient(s) as you type it
trans-unit.source: Send a live message - it will update for the recipient(s) as you type it
trans-unit.target: Enviar uma mensagem ao vivo - ela será atualizada para o(s) destinatário(s) conforme você a digita

trans-unit.id: Send them from gallery or custom keyboards.
trans-unit.source: Send them from gallery or custom keyboards.

trans-unit.target: O remetente cancelou a transferência de arquivos.

trans-unit.id: Sender may have deleted the connection request.
trans-unit.source: Sender may have deleted the connection request.
trans-unit.target: O remetente pode ter excluído a solicitação de conexão.

trans-unit.id: Sent messages will be deleted after set time.
trans-unit.source: Sent messages will be deleted after set time.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens enviadas serão excluídas depois do tempo definido.

trans-unit.id: Server requires authorization to create queues, check password
trans-unit.source: Server requires authorization to create queues, check password
trans-unit.target: O servidor requer autorização para criar filas, verifique a senha
Link de convite de uso único

trans-unit.id: SimpleX Chat security was audited by Trail of Bits.
trans-unit.source: SimpleX Chat security was audited by Trail of Bits.

trans-unit.id: SimpleX encrypted message or connection event
trans-unit.source: SimpleX encrypted message or connection event

trans-unit.id: Stop chat to enable database actions
trans-unit.source: Stop chat to enable database actions

trans-unit.id: Stop chat to export, import or delete chat database. You will not be able to receive and send messages while the chat is stopped.
trans-unit.source: Stop chat to export, import or delete chat database. You will not be able to receive and send messages while the chat is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Pare o chat para exportar, importar ou excluir o banco de dados do chat. Você não poderá receber e enviar mensagens enquanto o chat estiver interrompido.
Toque para entrar no modo anônimo

trans-unit.id: Tap to start a new chat
trans-unit.source: Tap to start a new chat

trans-unit.id: Thank you for installing SimpleX Chat!
trans-unit.source: Thank you for installing SimpleX Chat!

trans-unit.id: The 1st platform without any user identifiers – private by design.
trans-unit.source: The 1st platform without any user identifiers – private by design.
trans-unit.target: A 1ª plataforma sem nenhum identificador de usuário – privada por design.

trans-unit.id: The app can notify you when you receive messages or contact requests - please open settings to enable.
trans-unit.source: The app can notify you when you receive messages or contact requests - please open settings to enable.

trans-unit.id: The attempt to change database passphrase was not completed.
trans-unit.source: The attempt to change database passphrase was not completed.
trans-unit.target: A tentativa de alterar a senha do banco de dados não foi concluída.

trans-unit.id: The connection you accepted will be cancelled!
trans-unit.source: The connection you accepted will be cancelled!
trans-unit.target: A conexão que você aceitou será cancelada!

trans-unit.id: The contact you shared this link with will NOT be able to connect!
trans-unit.source: The contact you shared this link with will NOT be able to connect!
trans-unit.target: O contato com o qual você compartilhou este link NÃO será capaz de se conectar!

trans-unit.id: The created archive is available via app Settings / Database / Old database archive.
trans-unit.source: The created archive is available via app Settings / Database / Old database archive.

trans-unit.id: The group is fully decentralized – it is visible only to the members.
trans-unit.source: The group is fully decentralized – it is visible only to the members.
trans-unit.target: O grupo é totalmente descentralizado – é visível apenas para os membros.

trans-unit.id: The microphone does not work when the app is in the background.
trans-unit.source: The microphone does not work when the app is in the background.

trans-unit.id: The next generation of private messaging
trans-unit.source: The next generation of private messaging
trans-unit.target: A próxima geração de mensageiros privados

trans-unit.id: The old database was not removed during the migration, it can be deleted.
trans-unit.source: The old database was not removed during the migration, it can be deleted.

trans-unit.id: The profile is only shared with your contacts.
trans-unit.source: The profile is only shared with your contacts.
trans-unit.target: O perfil é compartilhado apenas com seus contatos.

trans-unit.id: The sender will NOT be notified
trans-unit.source: The sender will NOT be notified

trans-unit.id: The servers for new connections of your current chat profile **%@**.
trans-unit.source: The servers for new connections of your current chat profile **%@**.

trans-unit.id: This action cannot be undone - all received and sent files and media will be deleted. Low resolution pictures will remain.
trans-unit.source: This action cannot be undone - all received and sent files and media will be deleted. Low resolution pictures will remain.
trans-unit.target: Essa ação não pode ser desfeita - todos os arquivos e mídias recebidos e enviados serão excluídos. Imagens de baixa resolução permanecerão.

trans-unit.id: This action cannot be undone - the messages sent and received earlier than selected will be deleted. It may take several minutes.
trans-unit.source: This action cannot be undone - the messages sent and received earlier than selected will be deleted. It may take several minutes.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação não pode ser desfeita - as mensagens enviadas e recebidas antes do selecionado serão excluídas. Pode levar vários minutos.

trans-unit.id: This action cannot be undone - your profile, contacts, messages and files will be irreversibly lost.
trans-unit.source: This action cannot be undone - your profile, contacts, messages and files will be irreversibly lost.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação não pode ser desfeita - seu perfil, contatos, mensagens e arquivos serão irreversivelmente perdidos.

trans-unit.id: This feature is experimental! It will only work if the other client has version 4.2 installed. You should see the message in the conversation once the address change is completed – please check that you can still receive messages from this contact (or group member).
trans-unit.source: This feature is experimental! It will only work if the other client has version 4.2 installed. You should see the message in the conversation once the address change is completed – please check that you can still receive messages from this contact (or group member).
trans-unit.target: Esse recurso é experimental! Ele só funcionará se o outro cliente tiver a versão 4.2 instalada. Você deve ver a mensagem na conversa assim que a alteração de endereço for concluída – verifique se você ainda pode receber mensagens desse contato (ou membro do grupo).

trans-unit.id: This setting applies to messages in your current chat profile **%@**.
trans-unit.source: This setting applies to messages in your current chat profile **%@**.

trans-unit.id: To ask any questions and to receive updates:
trans-unit.source: To ask any questions and to receive updates:

trans-unit.id: To find the profile used for an incognito connection, tap the contact or group name on top of the chat.
trans-unit.source: To find the profile used for an incognito connection, tap the contact or group name on top of the chat.
trans-unit.target: Para encontrar o perfil utilizado para uma conexão anônima, toque no contato ou no nome do grupo no topo do chat.

trans-unit.id: To prevent the call interruption, enable Do Not Disturb mode.
trans-unit.source: To prevent the call interruption, enable Do Not Disturb mode.

trans-unit.id: To protect privacy, instead of user IDs used by all other platforms, SimpleX has identifiers for message queues, separate for each of your contacts.
trans-unit.source: To protect privacy, instead of user IDs used by all other platforms, SimpleX has identifiers for message queues, separate for each of your contacts.

trans-unit.id: To protect your information, turn on SimpleX Lock. You will be prompted to complete authentication before this feature is enabled.
trans-unit.source: To protect your information, turn on SimpleX Lock. You will be prompted to complete authentication before this feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Para proteger suas informações, ative o bloqueio SimpleX. Você será solicitado a completar a autenticação antes que este recurso seja ativado.

trans-unit.id: To record voice message please grant permission to use Microphone.
trans-unit.source: To record voice message please grant permission to use Microphone.

trans-unit.id: To support instant push notifications the chat database has to be migrated.
trans-unit.source: To support instant push notifications the chat database has to be migrated.

trans-unit.id: To verify end-to-end encryption with your contact compare (or scan) the code on your devices.
trans-unit.source: To verify end-to-end encryption with your contact compare (or scan) the code on your devices.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar a criptografia de ponta-a-ponta com seu contato, compare (ou escaneie) o código em seus dispositivos.

trans-unit.id: Trying to connect to the server used to receive messages from this contact (error: %@).
trans-unit.source: Trying to connect to the server used to receive messages from this contact (error: %@).

trans-unit.id: Trying to connect to the server used to receive messages from this contact.
trans-unit.source: Trying to connect to the server used to receive messages from this contact.
trans-unit.target: Tentando se conectar ao servidor utilizado para receber mensagens deste contato.

trans-unit.id: Unless your contact deleted the connection or this link was already used, it might be a bug - please report it. To connect, please ask your contact to create another connection link and check that you have a stable network connection.
trans-unit.source: Unless your contact deleted the connection or this link was already used, it might be a bug - please report it. To connect, please ask your contact to create another connection link and check that you have a stable network connection.
trans-unit.target: A menos que seu contato tenha excluído a conexão ou este link já tenha sido usado, pode ser um bug - por favor, relate-o. Para se conectar, peça ao seu contato para criar outro link de conexão e verifique se você tem uma conexão de rede estável.

trans-unit.id: Updating settings will re-connect the client to all servers.
trans-unit.source: Updating settings will re-connect the client to all servers.
trans-unit.target: A atualização das configurações reconectará o cliente a todos os servidores.

trans-unit.id: Updating this setting will re-connect the client to all servers.
trans-unit.source: Updating this setting will re-connect the client to all servers.

trans-unit.id: Using .onion hosts requires compatible VPN provider.
trans-unit.source: Using .onion hosts requires compatible VPN provider.

trans-unit.id: Voice messages are prohibited in this chat.
trans-unit.source: Voice messages are prohibited in this chat.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens de voz são proibidas neste chat.

trans-unit.id: Voice messages are prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.source: Voice messages are prohibited in this group.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens de voz são proibidas neste grupo.

trans-unit.id: When you share an incognito profile with somebody, this profile will be used for the groups they invite you to.
trans-unit.source: When you share an incognito profile with somebody, this profile will be used for the groups they invite you to.
trans-unit.target: Quando você compartilha um perfil anônimo com alguém, esse perfil será usado para os grupos aos quais essa pessoa o convidar.

trans-unit.id: You are connected to the server used to receive messages from this contact.
trans-unit.source: You are connected to the server used to receive messages from this contact.
trans-unit.target: Você está conectado ao servidor usado para receber mensagens desse contato.
Você está convidado para o grupo

trans-unit.id: You can also connect by clicking the link. If it opens in the browser, click **Open in mobile app** button.
trans-unit.source: You can also connect by clicking the link. If it opens in the browser, click **Open in mobile app** button.

trans-unit.id: You can now send messages to %@
trans-unit.source: You can now send messages to %@

trans-unit.id: You can set lock screen notification preview via settings.
trans-unit.source: You can set lock screen notification preview via settings.

trans-unit.id: You can share a link or a QR code - anybody will be able to join the group. You won't lose members of the group if you later delete it.
trans-unit.source: You can share a link or a QR code - anybody will be able to join the group. You won't lose members of the group if you later delete it.
trans-unit.target: Você pode compartilhar um link ou um código QR - qualquer um poderá entrar no grupo. Você não perderá membros do grupo se você deletá-los mais tarde.

trans-unit.id: You can share your address as a link or as a QR code - anybody will be able to connect to you. You won't lose your contacts if you later delete it.
trans-unit.source: You can share your address as a link or as a QR code - anybody will be able to connect to you. You won't lose your contacts if you later delete it.

trans-unit.id: You can start chat via app Settings / Database or by restarting the app
trans-unit.source: You can start chat via app Settings / Database or by restarting the app

trans-unit.id: You can use markdown to format messages:
trans-unit.source: You can use markdown to format messages:
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar markdown para formatar mensagens:

trans-unit.id: You control through which server(s) **to receive** the messages, your contacts – the servers you use to message them.
trans-unit.source: You control through which server(s) **to receive** the messages, your contacts – the servers you use to message them.

trans-unit.id: You could not be verified; please try again.
trans-unit.source: You could not be verified; please try again.
trans-unit.target: Você não pôde ser verificado; por favor, tente novamente.

trans-unit.id: You have to enter passphrase every time the app starts - it is not stored on the device.
trans-unit.source: You have to enter passphrase every time the app starts - it is not stored on the device.
trans-unit.target: Você tem que digitar a senha toda vez que o aplicativo iniciar - ela não é armazenada no dispositivo.

trans-unit.id: You joined this group. Connecting to inviting group member.
trans-unit.source: You joined this group. Connecting to inviting group member.
trans-unit.target: Você se juntou a este grupo. Conectando-se a um membro convidado do grupo.

trans-unit.id: You must use the most recent version of your chat database on one device ONLY, otherwise you may stop receiving the messages from some contacts.
trans-unit.source: You must use the most recent version of your chat database on one device ONLY, otherwise you may stop receiving the messages from some contacts.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar a versão mais recente de seu banco de dados de chat SOMENTE em um dispositivo, caso contrário, você pode parar de receber as mensagens de alguns contatos.

trans-unit.id: You need to allow your contact to send voice messages to be able to send them.
trans-unit.source: You need to allow your contact to send voice messages to be able to send them.
trans-unit.target: Você precisa permitir que seu contato envie mensagens de voz para poder enviá-las também.
Você rejeitou um convite de grupo

trans-unit.id: You will be connected to group when the group host's device is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.source: You will be connected to group when the group host's device is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.target: Você será conectado ao grupo quando o dispositivo do host do grupo estiver online, por favor aguarde ou verifique mais tarde!

trans-unit.id: You will be connected when your connection request is accepted, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.source: You will be connected when your connection request is accepted, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.target: Você será conectado quando sua solicitação de conexão for aceita, aguarde ou verifique mais tarde!

trans-unit.id: You will be connected when your contact's device is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.source: You will be connected when your contact's device is online, please wait or check later!
trans-unit.target: Você será conectado quando o dispositivo do seu contato estiver online, aguarde ou verifique mais tarde!

trans-unit.id: You will be required to authenticate when you start or resume the app after 30 seconds in background.
trans-unit.source: You will be required to authenticate when you start or resume the app after 30 seconds in background.
trans-unit.target: Você será solicitado a autenticar quando iniciar ou voltar ao aplicativo após 30 segundos em segundo plano.

trans-unit.id: You will join a group this link refers to and connect to its group members.
trans-unit.source: You will join a group this link refers to and connect to its group members.
trans-unit.target: Você se juntará a um grupo ao qual este link se refere e se conectará aos membros do seu grupo.

trans-unit.id: You will stop receiving messages from this group. Chat history will be preserved.
trans-unit.source: You will stop receiving messages from this group. Chat history will be preserved.
trans-unit.target: Você deixará de receber mensagens deste grupo. O histórico do chat será preservado.

trans-unit.id: You're trying to invite contact with whom you've shared an incognito profile to the group in which you're using your main profile
trans-unit.source: You're trying to invite contact with whom you've shared an incognito profile to the group in which you're using your main profile
trans-unit.target: Você está tentando convidar um contato com quem compartilhou um perfil anônimo para o grupo no qual está usando seu perfil principal

trans-unit.id: You're using an incognito profile for this group - to prevent sharing your main profile inviting contacts is not allowed
trans-unit.source: You're using an incognito profile for this group - to prevent sharing your main profile inviting contacts is not allowed
trans-unit.target: Você esta usando um perfil anônimo para este grupo - para evitar compartilhar seu perfil principal, convidar contatos não é permitido

trans-unit.id: Your chat database is not encrypted - set passphrase to encrypt it.
trans-unit.source: Your chat database is not encrypted - set passphrase to encrypt it.

trans-unit.id: Your chat profile will be sent to group members
trans-unit.source: Your chat profile will be sent to group members

trans-unit.id: Your chat profile will be sent to your contact
trans-unit.source: Your chat profile will be sent to your contact

trans-unit.id: Your chat profiles are stored locally, only on your device.
trans-unit.source: Your chat profiles are stored locally, only on your device.

trans-unit.id: Your contact can scan it from the app.
trans-unit.source: Your contact can scan it from the app.

trans-unit.id: Your contact needs to be online for the connection to complete. You can cancel this connection and remove the contact (and try later with a new link).
trans-unit.source: Your contact needs to be online for the connection to complete. You can cancel this connection and remove the contact (and try later with a new link).

trans-unit.id: Your contact sent a file that is larger than currently supported maximum size (%@).
trans-unit.source: Your contact sent a file that is larger than currently supported maximum size (%@).

trans-unit.id: Your contacts can allow full message deletion.
trans-unit.source: Your contacts can allow full message deletion.
trans-unit.target: Seus contatos podem permitir a exclusão completa da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Your current chat database will be DELETED and REPLACED with the imported one.

trans-unit.id: Your profile is stored on your device and shared only with your contacts. SimpleX servers cannot see your profile.
trans-unit.source: Your profile is stored on your device and shared only with your contacts. SimpleX servers cannot see your profile.

trans-unit.id: Your profile will be sent to the contact that you received this link from
trans-unit.source: Your profile will be sent to the contact that you received this link from

trans-unit.id: Your profile, contacts and delivered messages are stored on your device.

trans-unit.id: All your contacts will remain connected.
trans-unit.source: All your contacts will remain connected.

trans-unit.id: Allow calls only if your contact allows them.
trans-unit.source: Allow calls only if your contact allows them.

trans-unit.source: Allow your contacts to call you.

trans-unit.source: Thanks to the users – contribute via Weblate!

trans-unit.id: Server requires authorization to upload, check password
trans-unit.source: Server requires authorization to upload, check password

trans-unit.id: The message will be deleted for all members.
trans-unit.source: The message will be deleted for all members.

trans-unit.source: The message will be marked as moderated for all members.

trans-unit.id: There should be at least one visible user profile.
trans-unit.source: There should be at least one visible user profile.

trans-unit.id: To protect timezone, image/voice files use UTC.
trans-unit.source: To protect timezone, image/voice files use UTC.
trans-unit.target: Para proteger o fuso horário, os arquivos de imagem/voz usam UTC.

trans-unit.id: Video will be received when your contact completes uploading it.

trans-unit.id: Video will be received when your contact is online, please wait or check later!

trans-unit.target: O vídeo será recebido quando seu contato estiver online, aguarde ou verifique mais tarde!

trans-unit.source: Warning: you may lose some data!
trans-unit.target: Aviso: você pode perder alguns dados!

trans-unit.id: You can turn on SimpleX Lock via Settings.
trans-unit.source: You can turn on SimpleX Lock via Settings.
trans-unit.target: Você pode ativar o bloqueio SimpleX via Configurações.

trans-unit.id: You will still receive calls and notifications from muted profiles when they are active.
trans-unit.source: You will still receive calls and notifications from muted profiles when they are active.
trans-unit.target: Você ainda receberá chamadas e notificações de perfis silenciados quando eles estiverem ativos.
Erro ao atualizar a privacidade do usuário

trans-unit.id: It can happen when you or your connection used the old database backup.
trans-unit.source: It can happen when you or your connection used the old database backup.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode acontecer quando você ou sua conexão usaram o backup do banco de dados antigo.

trans-unit.id: Please report it to the developers.
trans-unit.source: Please report it to the developers.

trans-unit.id: Protect your chat profiles with a password!
trans-unit.source: Protect your chat profiles with a password!
trans-unit.target: Proteja seus perfis de chat com uma senha!

trans-unit.id: Set the message shown to new members!
trans-unit.source: Set the message shown to new members!
trans-unit.target: Defina a mensagem mostrada aos novos membros!

trans-unit.id: There should be at least one user profile.
trans-unit.source: There should be at least one user profile.
trans-unit.target: Deve haver pelo menos um perfil de usuário.

trans-unit.id: File will be deleted from servers.
trans-unit.source: File will be deleted from servers.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo será excluído dos servidores.

trans-unit.id: The ID of the next message is incorrect (less or equal to the previous). It can happen because of some bug or when the connection is compromised.
trans-unit.source: The ID of the next message is incorrect (less or equal to the previous). It can happen because of some bug or when the connection is compromised.
trans-unit.target: A ID da próxima mensagem está incorreta (menor ou igual à anterior). Isso pode acontecer por causa de algum bug ou quando a conexão está comprometida.

trans-unit.id: The hash of the previous message is different.
trans-unit.source: The hash of the previous message is different.
trans-unit.target: O hash da mensagem anterior é diferente.

trans-unit.id: This error is permanent for this connection, please re-connect.
trans-unit.source: This error is permanent for this connection, please re-connect.
trans-unit.target: Este erro é permanente para esta conexão, por favor, reconecte.

trans-unit.id: It can happen when: 1. The messages expired in the sending client after 2 days or on the server after 30 days. 2. Message decryption failed, because you or your contact used old database backup. 3. The connection was compromised.
trans-unit.source: It can happen when: 1. The messages expired in the sending client after 2 days or on the server after 30 days. 2. Message decryption failed, because you or your contact used old database backup. 3. The connection was compromised.
trans-unit.target: Pode acontecer quando: 1. As mensagens expiraram no remetente após 2 dias ou no servidor após 30 dias. 2. A descriptografia da mensagem falhou porque você ou seu contato usou o backup do banco de dados antigo. 3. A conexão foi comprometida.

trans-unit.id: Only your contact can make calls.
trans-unit.source: Only your contact can make calls.
trans-unit.target: Somente seu contato pode fazer chamadas.
O recebimento do arquivo será interrompido.
O envio do arquivo será interrompido.

trans-unit.id: Set it instead of system authentication.
trans-unit.source: Set it instead of system authentication.
trans-unit.target: Defina-o em vez da autenticação do sistema.

trans-unit.id: All your contacts will remain connected. Profile update will be sent to your contacts.
trans-unit.source: All your contacts will remain connected. Profile update will be sent to your contacts.
trans-unit.target: Todos os seus contatos permanecerão conectados. A atualização do perfil será enviada aos seus contatos.

trans-unit.id:
Hi!

Connect to me via SimpleX Chat
trans-unit.source:
Hi!

Connect to me via SimpleX Chat

trans-unit.id: Add address to your profile, so that your contacts can share it with other people. Profile update will be sent to your contacts.
trans-unit.source: Add address to your profile, so that your contacts can share it with other people. Profile update will be sent to your contacts.
trans-unit.target: Adicione o endereço ao seu perfil, para que seus contatos possam compartilhá-lo com outras pessoas. A atualização do perfil será enviada aos seus contatos.

trans-unit.id: Authentication is required before the call is connected, but you may miss calls.
trans-unit.source: Authentication is required before the call is connected, but you may miss calls.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação é requerida antes da chamada ser conectada, mas pode perder chamadas.
Mensagem encriptada: erro na migração da base de dados

trans-unit.id: - voice messages up to 5 minutes. - custom time to disappear. - editing history.
trans-unit.source: - voice messages up to 5 minutes. - custom time to disappear. - editing history.
trans-unit.target: - mensagens de voz até 5 minutos. - tempo personalizado para desaparecer. - histórico de edição.
Todos os dados da app são apagados.

trans-unit.id: All data is erased when it is entered.
trans-unit.source: All data is erased when it is entered.
trans-unit.target: Todos os dados são apagados quando introduzidos.

trans-unit.id: Allow message reactions only if your contact allows them.
trans-unit.source: Allow message reactions only if your contact allows them.
trans-unit.target: Permitir reações a mensagens só se o seu contacto as permitir.

trans-unit.id: Allow your contacts adding message reactions.
trans-unit.source: Allow your contacts adding message reactions.
trans-unit.target: Permitir que os seus contactos adicionem reações a mensagens.

trans-unit.id: An empty chat profile with the provided name is created, and the app opens as usual.
trans-unit.source: An empty chat profile with the provided name is created, and the app opens as usual.
trans-unit.target: Um perfil vazio é criado com o nome fornecido, e a aplicação abre como de costume.

trans-unit.id: App passcode is replaced with self-destruct passcode.
trans-unit.source: App passcode is replaced with self-destruct passcode.
trans-unit.target: A senha é substituída por uma senha auto-destrutiva.

trans-unit.id: Both you and your contact can add message reactions.
trans-unit.source: Both you and your contact can add message reactions.
trans-unit.target: Ambos você e o seu contato podem adicionar reações a mensagens.

trans-unit.id: Create an address to let people connect with you.
trans-unit.source: Create an address to let people connect with you.
trans-unit.target: Crie um endereço para que outras pessoas se possam conectar a você.
%@, %@ e %lld e outros membros se conectaram

trans-unit.source: SimpleX needs camera access to scan QR codes to connect to other users and for video calls.
SimpleX uses Face ID for local authentication
SimpleX needs microphone access for audio and video calls, and to record voice messages.
SimpleX needs access to Photo Library for saving captured and received media
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Copyright © 2022 SimpleX Chat. All rights reserved.
